GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves a user according to their username

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article according to its id

article.title: Sweet potato & butternut squash soup with lemon & garlic toast
article.author: weegembump
article.body: Roast your vegetables in honey before blitzing into this velvety smooth, spiced soup - served with garlicky, zesty ciabatta slices for dipping

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates a specified article's vote count, body, topic or title

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves the comments of a specified article by its id
